div.div:
小游戏引发了CloseRequested事件
或
玩家通过其他方式强制关闭？

div.div: 侦听器请求关闭小游戏？

switch.text: 侦听器请求关闭小游戏？

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1541px; margin-left: 662px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;

display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 251px; margin-left: 622px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 131px; height: 1px; padding-top: 330px; margin-left: 851px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 136px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 459px; height: 1px; padding-top: 330px; margin-left: 991px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 136px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
委托类型： Action<int>
委托参数说明：该委托有一个int值，此值用于指示小游戏的完成状态码。侦听此事件的侦听者需要根据此状态码决定后续操作。（例如：视觉小说中载入间章或继续主线）
引发方式：调用MiniGameBase基类中定义的OnGameCompleted(int)方法
作用说明：在游戏完成时引发此事件即可，后续操作由侦听者执行

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 131px; height: 1px; padding-top: 475px; margin-left: 851px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 146px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 459px; height: 1px; padding-top: 475px; margin-left: 991px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 146px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
委托类型： Action
委托参数说明：无
引发方式：调用MiniGameBase基类中定义的OnCloseRequested方法。
作用说明：在游戏需要关闭时（例如：玩家点击了关闭按钮）引发此事件即可，后续操作由侦听者执行

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 160px; height: 1px; padding-top: 784px; margin-left: 851px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 49px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 330px; height: 1px; padding-top: 784px; margin-left: 1020px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 49px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 该方法被设计为在游戏中请求载入小游戏后调用以完成小游戏的初始化等操作。该方法的通常实现应为在游戏开始前调整小游戏的状态，例如：初始化、禁用/启用某些操作。

switch.text: 该方法被设计为在游戏中请求载入小游戏后调用以完成小游戏的初始化等操作。该方法的通常实现应为在游戏开始前调整小游戏的状态，例如：初始化、禁用/启用某些操作。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 160px; height: 1px; padding-top: 860px; margin-left: 851px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 96px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 330px; height: 1px; padding-top: 860px; margin-left: 1020px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 96px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
参数类型：System.Action
作用说明：回调函数，该函数被设计为在小游戏的卸载工作完成后所需要进行的后续操作，请在游戏小游戏的载入工作完成后调用此函数

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 160px; height: 1px; padding-top: 965px; margin-left: 851px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 106px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 330px; height: 1px; padding-top: 965px; margin-left: 1020px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 106px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
参数类型：MiniGameLoadMode枚举
作用说明：用于指示小游戏的载入模式（目前有视觉小说与营地模式）。在小游戏的具体实现中可根据此参数的值调整小游戏的内容等。（例如，隐藏设置按钮，修改点击难度选择按钮时的行为）

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 160px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1737px; margin-left: 1121px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 49px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 330px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1737px; margin-left: 1290px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 49px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 该方法被设计为在游戏中卸载小游戏的操作。该方法的通常实现应是清理小游戏运行中产生的临时游戏对象实例以及重置小游戏状态等

switch.text: 该方法被设计为在游戏中卸载小游戏的操作。该方法的通常实现应是清理小游戏运行中产生的临时游戏对象实例以及重置小游戏状态等

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 160px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1813px; margin-left: 1121px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 96px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 330px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1813px; margin-left: 1290px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; max-height: 96px; overflow: hidden;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
参数类型：System.Action
作用说明：回调函数，该函数被设计为在小游戏的卸载工作完成后所需要进行的后续操作，请在游戏小游戏的卸载工作完成后调用此函数

a.text: Viewer does not support full SVG 1.1
